item.description:
2013 Sleigh Bell Run â€“ 4 Mile Road Race. A scenic course starting on Hope Street and running through Highland Park area. Pre-register at Recreation Department or Town Hall or day of race at Hope & Olive Restaurant from 8:45-9:30am. Age divisions and prizes. First 75 entrants receive t-shirt and sleigh bell bracelets. $15 pre race entry, $20 race day. Youth under the age of 18 are half price.
http://www.greenfield-ma.gov/pages/GreenfieldMA_Recreation/WinterCarnival
item.name: Sleigh Bell Run (4 miles) - Greenfield, MA
